SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.manager

Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.manager.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends Object
The CollisionManager class handles collision detection and resolution for the game. It manages collisions between friendly units, enemy units, and projectiles.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionManager

      public CollisionManager(List<ActiveActorDestructible> friendlyUnits, List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyUnits, List<ActiveActorDestructible> userProjectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyProjectiles, UserPlane user, double screenWidth)
      Constructs a new CollisionManager instance with the specified lists of actors and the user plane.
      Parameters:
      friendlyUnits - the list of friendly units
      enemyUnits - the list of enemy units
      userProjectiles - the list of user projectiles
      enemyProjectiles - the list of enemy projectiles
      user - the user plane
      screenWidth - the width of the screen

  • Method Details

    • handleCollisions

      public void handleCollisions()
      Handles all types of collisions in the game. This includes plane collisions, user projectile collisions, enemy projectile collisions, and enemy penetration.

    • handlePlaneCollisions

      private void handlePlaneCollisions()
      Handles collisions between friendly units and enemy units.

    • handleUserProjectileCollisions

      private void handleUserProjectileCollisions()
      Handles collisions between user projectiles and enemy units.

    • handleEnemyProjectileCollisions

      private void handleEnemyProjectileCollisions()
      Handles collisions between enemy projectiles and friendly units.

    • handleCollisions

      private void handleCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors1, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors2)
      Handles collisions between two lists of actors.
      Parameters:
      actors1 - the first list of actors
      actors2 - the second list of actors

    • handleEnemyPenetration

      private void handleEnemyPenetration()
      Handles enemy penetration by checking if any enemy has moved past the screen width. If an enemy penetrates the defenses, the user takes damage and the enemy is destroyed.

    • enemyHasPenetratedDefenses

      private boolean enemyHasPenetratedDefenses(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Checks if an enemy has penetrated the defenses by moving past the screen width.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to check
      Returns:
      true if the enemy has penetrated the defenses, false otherwise
